Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Bricks
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the texture for Bricks in whole Blocks and Stairs, Slabs and Walls.

requiresefr

incompat{Bricks Complete Pack}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Planks
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the texture for Planks in whole Blocks and Stairs, Slabs, Fences and Fence Gates. Also includes tweaks for Fences, Buttons and Pressure Plates. Also randomizes the textures of Crimson, Warped, Cherry and Mangrove Planks.

requiresefr

overrideslave{Desaturated Dark Oak Complete Pack}
overrideslave{Curracabah Acacia Complete Pack}
overrideslave{Vintage Cherry Complete Pack}
overrideslave{Darker Mangrove Complete Pack}
overrideslave{Red Crimson Complete Pack}
overrideslave{Muted Warped Wood Complete Pack}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Grass and Fern [old]
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the textures for Tall Grass and Ferns so that they appear to be of random height. Also applies a mirrored texture to Dead Bushes.

incompat{Randomized Grass and Fern}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Bookshelves
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the side texture for Bookshelves so that they appear to be more random.

incompat{Connected Bookshelves}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Pumpkins
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the side texture for Pumpkins and Jack o'Lanterns.

overrideslave{Pumpkin Complete Pack}
incompat{Fixed Pumpkin}
